siteMetadata.title: Papupata Documentation
siteMetadata.description: Documentation for the typescript library papupata, for utilizing types for AJAX requests.

markdownRemark.html: Papupata is a way to avoid having typescript type safety break at API boundaries. While its primary use case is for browser to server (and back) communications, it can just as well be used for server-to-server traffic.
